resources.string: Type A Question & Give Us A Shake
Thank you for consulting the Pop Oracle. Your answer is divined.

The Pop Oracle is a musical divination format where questions are answered by picking songs at random and interpreting the randomly chosen songs as the answer to the question, like picking musical tarot cards. Give us a shake!

Concept by Andras Jones
 Design by Gorilla Gizmos
 contact@gorillagizmos.com
